title: DrFormulas Retinol Cream for Acne Treatment with Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, Zinc PCA | Dermtella for Teens, Men & Women with Oily Acne Prone Skin, Non-comedogenic Moisturizer (1 Fl Oz)
features: ACNE TREATMENT: DrFormulas Dermtella is a unique acne treatment that contains retinol to fight hormonal and cystic acne along with whiteheads, blackheads & proactively prevent future breakouts.
INFLAMMATORY PIMPLES: Dermtella works by promoting skin cell turnover and effectively targets two primary causes of acne - clogged pores and inflammation.
OIL PRODUCTION: Dermtella is a night time gel designed to help control oil production and promote clear skin while you sleep. Dermatrope can be used along a light moisturizer.
ACNE SCARS: By promoting skin turnover, Dermtella help decrease the appearance of acne scars.
The American Academy of Dermatology recommends topical retinoids as a first-line therapy for all acne cases
description: Dermtella Retinol Cream is a doctor formulated retinol night time gel for acne treatment that can be used with moisturizer creams & gentle face washes. It is designed to not only prevent and control the breakout of pimples but also help diminish old acne scars. It is gentle and easy on the skin with careful use. Along with our Dermtella Acne Supplement, it is the perfect combination to promote clear, healthy, beautiful skin from inside out.
